message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. Given its worth, I believe a starting price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product is worth a premium. How about we settle at $10,250? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's close this gap - I can do $10,000, but that's my absolute best offer.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. This is my final offer.
